metadata.title: CVE-2016-7998 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The SPIP template composer/compiler in SPIP 3.1.2 and earlier allows remoteauthenticated users to execute arbitrary PHP code by uploading an HTML filewith a crafted (1) INCLUDE or (2) INCLURE tag and then accessing it with avalider_xml action.

criterions.comment: spip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
